ComicInfo.Summary:
Buzzard must exploit an inside source to discover what the thing is that calls itself Labrazio, and determine if they've any hope of defeating it as the tension between the Goon and Labrazio gangs erupts into an all out war.Eric Powell's critically acclaimed series The Goon continues, with Dave Stewart on colors.
